name: Death - A Comedy
description:
A quick story about an old man celebrating his death day. A day which is similar to an old-fashioned funeral, but instead the people travel to hell and find themselves not in a paradise or anything but rather in an afterlife which is welcoming everybody!

This is my first time using bitsy and I mostly tried to "show-off" my terrible writing skills.

Also, I tried to learn how to convey visual information to the user with restrictions and limitations. 

Enjoy! :)
